responsibilities: Led the end-to-end development of Django APIs, utilizing RESTful best practices and integrating seamlessly with Angular, enhancing system features and strengthening a scalable microservices architecture.
Optimized codebase for efficiency, contributing to a 25% improvement in system scalability and capabilities.

Implemented Version History feature with Angular and Django, using GraphQL for backend API development and NgRx for frontend state management, leading to a 12% increase in platform pricing and revenue boost.
Enhanced user experience by implementing skeleton loaders, replacing slow loading spinners, and reducing screen wait times by 5%, leading to higher user satisfaction and engagement.
Streamlined backend application by upgrading from Django 2.2 to 3.2, reducing technical debt and eliminating over 5000+ lines of code, resulting in a more efficient and high-performing system.
Designed a recommendation system in Python that analyzed user communications to suggest relevant content, resulting in a 13% increase in user engagement.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Django REST Framework, enabling efficient communication with the Gmail API in Python to process user emails.
Used Celery as a task queue and Redis as a messaging broker to execute asynchronous and periodic tasks, improving app performance by 33%.

projects.name: GNews, PyPi Package
projects.description: An open source lightweight Python package that provides an API to search for articles on Google News and returns a usable JSON response. This repository has 700+ stars on GitHub.

projects.name: Haroof-E-Tahaji Handwritten Letter Recognizer, CNN Model
projects.description: Created a deep learning model for Urdu handwritten letters recognition in Python using CNN, developed from scratch with over 175,000 data samples.
